How it Works?
After your payment, etsy will send you an email with a link to your
downloadable files. This will be sent to the email that is registered with

How do i unzip the files?
*If you have a Windows computer follow the next steps:
1right click on file
2select Extract All
3select the location you would like the file to be placed
4select OK
5the file is now unzipped and ready to use.
*If you have Mac computer:
just double click on the zipped folder

SVG is compatible with:

DXF is compatible with:
Silhouette Studio Basic Edition
EPS is compatible with:
Adobe Illustrator, Corel Draw, and Inkscape.

item.title: Not all who wander are lost Custom Pet ID Tag circle, Personalized Dog Tag, Identification name tag, Cat Tag, Anodized, Bag Tag
item.description:
Not all who wander are lost Pet ID Tag. Don't let your pet out without one!
Available in Black, Red, Green, Blue, Lt. Blue, Purple, Hot Pink, Pink, Silver, Gold, Orange
These can also be used as a cat ID tag, lunch box tag, bag tag, identification name tag and more!
PRODUCT FEATURES - Glossy finish, circle tag - High quality anodized aluminum metal - UV Resistant and Waterproof. Cleans up easily with a towel. - Split ring included. - Double-Sided (Add your pet's name / your number to the back.) - Tag Size is 1.25" x 1"
HOW TO ORDER When you check out, please include this information (in the "Message to Seller" box): 1. Pet Name and Number
OPTIONAL ADD-ONs Add a silencer to your purchase of this ID tag! They are clear, silicone bands that glow in the dark. They do a great job at protecting the tag from wear and tear, and help reduce noise.
Please note: Color may be slightly different than what you are seeing on your screen.
All collars and ID tags are not indestructible. Sometimes things can happen that can damage your item. Please be aware, If your pet scratches at the collar, it can damage the top layer. Over time, the printed surface of the ID tags will become scratched / chipped from hitting things like the hardware on the collar. The ID tags are durable, but they are not chew resistant.
--CUSTOM DESIGNS -- Custom items are available. Message me with any questions you may have.

item.title: Black Cat With Big Eyes Design files svg studio3 pdf jpeg cut File Print And Cutout Svg Pdf Studio 3 Jpeg Four Cricut Babyshower Birthday
item.description:
This is a cut or print image file that can be used in a variation of ways and with a lot of different materials.
You are able to cut using paper, vinyl and many other cutter friendly materials.
You can either print and cut or just print the image and use it on iron-on crafting projects that use a heat press or iron such as clothing, bags, pillow cases or DIY crafting such as making a pillow with this image as a iron-on.
Excellent a just a stand alone print out for cards, invitations ect the possibilities are limitless.
This design is formatted to work with Silhouette Studio (Basic, Designer, and Business Editions), Cricut Design Space, & Brother ScanNCutCanvas.
***Important***
Cricut Design Space does NOT support uploading SVG'S from mobile devices such as ipad & iPhone ect as of this time. The design files must be uploaded first to Cricut Design Space from a computer then are able to be accessed from your Mobil device ipad, iPhone ect from the app.
This listing includes 5 files:
1 SVG Cut File 1 Studio3 Cut File 1 Studio2 Cut File 1 PDF 1 JPEG
Please: No reselling the files.
The zip file containing the cut file/s will be instantly available to download after payment is confirmed. No physical item will be shipped.
Here's how to download file after purchase: https://www.etsy.com/help/article/3949

item.title: Cats on Sites 2018
item.description:
Priority Shipping Included!
A4A member, Katie Hoffman, designed this fun calendar to highlight archaeological sites in a playful way by adding cats.
It is great for Cat Lovers, Archaeologists, White Elephant Gift Exchanges, or just for fun.
8.5X11 inches
Art4Archaeology is an artist collective with dedicated members who are passionate about preservation of prehistoric and historic cultural resources.
All proceeds from this sale will be provided to Nevadans for Cultural Preservation (NVFCP), a 501c3 nonprofit with a mission to preserve cultural resources (archaeology) through education. To learn more visit www.nvfcp.org
If you are able to pick this item up in Las Vegas, NV, please contact rayette@nvfcp.org for a $5.00 coupon code .

item.title: Castor Collar, Custom Dog Collar, Cat Collar, Moon Collar, Metallic Collar, Space Collar, Dog on the Moon
item.description:
This Iisting is for the Castor collar
Dog on the Moon collars are hand-crafted by yours truly here in the United States. Each collar is custom made to order for your totally out of this world pet! Dog on the Moon gear is created with individual attention to detail, lots of love, and a surplus positive vibes. Each collar is made with a durable and waterproof webbing core surrounded by multiple layers of cotton fabric. Our recycled packaging is hand-stamped and each collar purchase comes with a free gift. Please read the full listing description and see all example photos.
Available collar widths: 3/4 inch (2 cm), 1 inch (2.5 cm), 1.5 inch (3.8 cm), 2 inch (5 cm)
Available collar styles: Slip on, buckle, martingale, martingale chain, cat collar
Available collar hardware: Silver, brass, black
——————————————————— 3/4 inch width- This one is for the little guys! Cats and small pets under 20 lbs.
1 inch width- Comfortably fits pets of almost any size, from corgis to labradors!
1.5 inch width- One size up from our 1 inch width, this is the most loved size among medium- large pets and those with a little extra collar consuming fluff! This is the width I personally prefer for my adult male Siberian Husky.
2 inch width- The eye catcher. this width is for pets with a larger than life size to match their personality! A great option for German Shepherds, Giant breeds, Malamutes, dogs with extra long necks, and long haired large pets.
——————————————————— Slip on- This unique collar features a sleek design that really shows off the print, it is a customer favorite. This buckle-less collar does NOT function as a martingale and tighten when pulled. Made with plenty of adjusting room, you can be assured the collar will be able to go over your pet’s head and also be tightened snug on their neck. Available in silver, brass (gold), and black hardware.
Buckle- The standard in the collar world, this classic design features a slide release style buckle. Available in black plastic buckle, silver metal buckle & hardware, and brass (gold) metal buckle & hardware. Silver hardware comes standard with the black plastic buckle.
Martingale- This collar design consists of two main loops. When tension is applied this collar tightens and prevents the dog from backing out of the collar. I recommend researching this collar type before purchasing. Available in silver, brass (gold), and black hardware.
Martingale Chain- This collar functions the same way mentioned above but the second loop is a silver metal half check-chain instead of a fabric loop.
Cat Collar- Our cat collars have a wide range of length that adjusts from 7”-13” and fit almost any feline neck measurement. They are outfitted with a super lightweight break-away style buckle, silver adjuster slide, and an extra small silver metal D-ring to attach a bell or ID tag. Every cat collar comes with a jingle bell.
——————————————————— Collar Length: All dog collars are made with 2-3 inches of adjusting room in each direction from the neck measurement specified in the drop down menu. For example: a collar length of 16 inches is selected from the drop down menu, this collar will have an estimated adjustable range of 13-19 inches. If you have a growing puppy and would prefer extra wiggle room, write your specifications in the notes to seller upon checkout and I will do my best to meet your request. Please provide puppy’s current neck measurement and estimated adult size.
Our cat collars are one size fits all and have an adjustable length of 7- 13 inches. When purchasing a cat collar please select the 7 inches collar length from the drop down menu. Custom sizing available per request before purchasing.
How to measure your pet’s neck: Use a fabric tape measure and measure around your pet's neck where a collar would normally sit. Pulling it snug, you should be able to fit 2 fingers between the neck and tape measure. This number (in inches) is your collar length. I recommend measuring twice to ensure accurate sizing. If you have any questions do not hesitate to send me a message, Dog on the Moon is not responsible for any customer error including inaccurate sizing.
Centimeter to Inch Conversion: 2.5 cm = 1 in
——————————————————— All items ordered under this listing will be made using the same fabric that is pictured; however, the orientation and isolation of the fabric will be different, making each collar unique! Please acknowledge that I do not produce these fabrics myself and colors may appear slightly different in person compared to photos on a screen. ——————————————————— Care Information: I recommend hand washing your collar. Using warm water and mild detergent, gently scrub the entirety of the fabric loop and rinse thoroughly. These collars are designed with a waterproof core so you do not have to worry about moisture build up (or the smell that can accompany it). Remove excess water by patting with a towel, drying the hardware thoroughly. Lay collar on a flat surface to dry. Do not place in a commercial dryer. Once completely dry, your collar is as good as new! Wrinkles can be easily combatted with a quick pass of an iron on the LOWEST setting. With proper care and maintenance, your collar will last through all of your most memorable adventures and well deserved naps! ——————————————————— Processing and Shipping: Our current processing time is 2-3 weeks. Thank you for your patience, I work my hardest to get your items out to you as soon as possible! Average delivery time (after you receive your shipping confirmation) is 2-4 business days for orders within the United States and 7-14 business days everywhere else. Dog on the Moon is not responsible for any customs fees or shipping delays. I am not responsible if your package is lost or stolen during transport. I am not responsible for any customer error when providing an accurate shipping address. If you have never purchased an item from the United States, I recommend looking into your local customs regulations at your nearest post office. ——————————————————— Treats: All domestic orders come with a single ingredient treat for your pet, read your shipping confirmation email thoroughly for more information on your treat. Please acknowledge any dietary restrictions your pet may have before feeding. ——————————————————— Crystals: Every collar purchase comes with a crystal or stone; charged with positive energy and ready to join you on your journey! I am very passionate about crystals and the metaphysical side of life, as a Reiki master I feel that it is really my duty to help spread the pure loving energy of the Earth to anyone and everyone possible! I hope you enjoy this free gift. ——————————————————— Custom Orders: If you have a clear vision of a design or pattern that you do not see available in the shop, send me a message and I will do my best to meet your custom collar requests. If you would like a unique mix of hardware or need a collar length that is not available in the drop down menu, send me a message before purchasing. If you would like a specific thread color used on your collar, leave your request in the notes to seller at checkout. ——————————————————— I do not recommend leaving a collar on your pet unsupervised. Keep your best friend safe; remove all accessories before leaving your pet alone to avoid choking and strangulation hazards. Dog on the Moon is not responsible for any injuries caused by misuse or negligence. Dog on the Moon is not responsible if your pet chews, rips, or reduces the product value in any way. Please do not request an exchange or refund if Fido gets too frisky and a collar is mistaken for a chew toy, dogs will be dogs after all! ——————————————————— Dog on the Moon is very active on Instagram, follow our page @dogonthemoon for exclusive discounts, sales, and contests. I love staying connected with customers; let me know your pet’s Instagram page in the notes to seller upon checkout! Tag @dogonthemoon and use hashtag #dogonthemoon in your photos so the world can see your pet!
- -
